analysis.description:
MainBonus.Withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x318bf186c7681ed7efd57839e6415cd8a162713c.sol#777-793) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- acc.transfer(bonus) (/unique_contracts/0x318bf186c7681ed7efd57839e6415cd8a162713c.sol#790-792)

MainBonus.MasterWithdraw (/unique_contracts/0x318bf186c7681ed7efd57839e6415cd8a162713c.sol#793-799) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- receiver.transfer(bonus) (/unique_contracts/0x318bf186c7681ed7efd57839e6415cd8a162713c.sol#796-797)
